name: SurpriseEncode
full_name: Evaluation of Surprising Temporal Patterns with Bits Encoding.
paper: Mining Surprising Patterns Using Temporal Description Length.
description: Algorithm designed to find surprising temporal patterns. The notion of surprise relies on the notion of interest and is measured by the number of bits needed to encode a itemset sequence using a specific coding scheme. A sequence with large code length hints at a possibly surprising correlation.
